jdbcService.sql: insert into workflow_transition_instance ( id, definition_id, workflow_id, parent_id, actor_id, system_id, started, stopped, log, error_log, error_code, sequence, transition_state, from_state_id, to_state_id ) values ( :id, :definitionId, :workflowId, :parentId, :actorId, :systemId, :started, :stopped, :log, :errorLog, :errorCode, :sequence, :transitionState, :fromStateId, :toStateId )
